issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly Centos 6 job fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6441](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6441). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/580192251

Log seems to implicate doubleconversion, which is why I didn't bundle this with the rest in ARROW-6440.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6441?focusedCommentId=16923503) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I think you linked the wrong PR to this issue. This one is for Centos 6, with the doubleconversion issue. But in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5285#issuecomment-528210038 you said 

> CentOS 7 build is succeeded.
> CentOS 6 build is failed but it's a problem of double-conversion. This is unrelated.
 
Apologies if I misunderstood or if you have this covered elsewhere, just didn't want to lose track of the Centos 6 issue.
